mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST( POST_SEQ, POST_INFO_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENTS, POST_DESCRIPTION, IS_MAIN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, USE_YN) VALUES( GET_SEQ('POST'), #{postInfoId}, #{postTitle}, #{postContents}, #{postDescription}, #{isMain}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{createUser}, 'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET POST_INFO_ID=#{postInfoId}, POST_TITLE=#{postTitle}, POST_CONTENTS=#{postContents}, POST_DESCRIPTION=#{postDescription}, IS_MAIN=#{isMain}, USE_YN=#{useYn}, UPDATE_DATE=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser} WHERE POST_SEQ=#{postSeq}
mapper.select: /* selectPost userMapper.xml */ SELECT POST_SEQ AS postSeq, POST_INFO_ID AS postInfoId, POST_TITLE AS postTitle, POST_CONTENTS AS postContents, POST_DESCRIPTION AS postDescription, IS_MAIN AS isMain, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CREATE_USER AS createUser, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, UPDATE_USER AS updateUser, USE_YN AS useYn FROM POST WHERE POST_SEQ=#{postSeq} AND USE_YN=#{useYn}

/* selectPostList userMapper.xml */ SELECT POST_SEQ AS postSeq, POST_INFO_ID AS postInfoId, POST_TITLE AS postTitle, POST_CONTENTS AS postContents, POST_DESCRIPTION AS postDescription, IS_MAIN AS isMain, CREATE_DATE AS createDate, CREATE_USER AS createUser, UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate, UPDATE_USER AS updateUser, USE_YN AS useYn FROM POST WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN=#{useYn}
